channel.title: CVE Feed for Lindell TSS Implementations -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lindell TSS Implementations -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-33242|2024-10-10T12:47:35.497Z -- lindell%20tss%20implementations -- wallet
item.description: Crypto wallets implementing the Lindell17 TSS protocol might allow an attacker to extract the full ECDSA private key by exfiltrating a single bit in every signature attempt (256 in total) because of not adhering to the paper's security proof's assumption regarding handling aborts after a failed signature.
